name: Woo Coupons Pay for Shipping
author: Azharul Haque Lincoln

sections.description: When coupons amount total is greater than the cart total, woocommerce by default does not allow coupons to pay for the shipping. For example, if cart subtotal is $200 and shipping cost is calculated to $10. Now buyer applies a coupon of total $210 of value. In woocommerce, only $200 coupon amount will count and the buyer still has to pay for his/her shipping. Few shop owners may like to allow coupons to pay for the buyers shipping cost too (if applicable). This plugin will allow shop owners to active that feature.
sections.installation:
Installing “Woocommerce Coupons Pay for Shipping WordPressAnt” can be done either by searching for “Woocommerce Coupons Pay for Shipping WordPressAnt” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the Woocommerce Coupons Pay for Shipping – WordPressAnt plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is the plugin work for multiple coupon?

short_description: Allow woocommerce coupons to pay for customers shipping too!
description: When coupons amount total is greater than the cart total, woocommerce by default does not allow coupons to pay for the shipping. For example, if cart subtotal is $200 and shipping cost is calculated to $10. Now buyer applies a coupon of total $210 of value. In woocommerce, only $200 coupon amount will count and the buyer still has to pay for his/her shipping. Few shop owners may like to allow coupons to pay for the buyers shipping cost too (if applicable). This plugin will allow shop owners to active that feature.
